Hero-Section.name: Hussein,
Hero-Section.aboutme: Tech enthusiast who loves to create appealing web apps.

About-Section.title: About
About-Section.description: I've always been a tech enthusiast, fascinated by the amazing world of technology. I enjoyed tweaking my computer and smartphone, adding mods to them. Then, I decided to enter the programming world to create things that others could see and be amazed by. Since I like people to see my work, I leaned more towards frontend development. I've been enjoying working with all its languages and technologies

Projects-Section.title: Selected Projects
Projects-Section.project0: Created dynamic football score and stats tracker with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Utilized APIs for real-time updates on scores and stats
Projects-Section.project1: great app created with react and tailwindCSS for styling and amazing user-interface.
Projects-Section.project2: A React-based ebook store with Tailwind CSS and MongoDB, featuring other amazing tools.
Projects-Section.project3: Document app with real-time editing using React.js, Socket.IO, and MongoDB.
Projects-Section.project4: Weather app with real-time updates, built using React and Tailwind CSS
Projects-Section.project5: an budget manager created with react for frontend and tailwindCSS for styling.
Projects-Section.project6: Google-like search engine built with Next.js frontend, API routes for backend, and Tailwind CSS for UI.

Contact-Section.title: Let's Connect
Contact-Section.content: Let's connect and bring you ideas to life! whether you have a project in mind, want to discuss collaboration, or simply have a question.
Contact-Section.subject: Subject
